item.title: Say 'Hello' to Node.js
item.description: What is Node.js? : Node.jsÂ® is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome’s V8 JavaScript engine. Node.js uses an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model that makes it lightweight and efficient. Node.js’ package ecosystem, npm, is the largest ecosystem of open source libraries in the world. - Official Website Creepy, huh? npm? npm is the Node.js package manager. It allows us to easily install modules and packages to use with Node.
